channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- 404 Solution

item.title: CVE-2024-1068|2024-03-11T18:08:57.515Z -- Unknown -- 404 Solution
item.description: The 404 Solution WordPress plugin before 2.35.8 does not properly sanitise and escape a parameter before using it in a SQL statement, leading to a SQL injection exploitable by high privilege users such as admins.
